author: jwoolley
msg: Add an allocator-passing mechanism throughout the bucket brigades API.
This allows us to get away from malloc and free for the most part, which
will hopefully be a huge performance win.

author: wrowe
msg: Resolve type saftey that the author couldn't resolve... the emits could
not be resolved because len describes a memory buffer, and memory buffer
This commit identifies a host of potential bugs in the flatten() APIs.
Extensive review of the use cases is required to clean up the API.
